headline: Rio Tinto Buyout Deal Receives Arcadium Lithium Shareholder Approvals
summary: RIO expects the Arcadium Lithium acquisition to close in mid-2025 after receiving the latter's shareholder approval.

raw.headline: Rio Tinto Buyout Deal Receives Arcadium Lithium Shareholder Approvals
raw.summary: RIO expects the Arcadium Lithium acquisition to close in mid-2025 after receiving the latter's shareholder approval.
